statements: DELETE FROM exercise_history WHERE exercise_id = 1 AND exercise_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM exercise_history WHERE exercise_name = 'Squats' AND weight_lifted > 100;
DELETE FROM exercise_history WHERE sets_completed >= 3 AND reps_completed >= 10;
DELETE FROM exercise_logs WHERE exercise_name = 'Bench Press';
DELETE FROM exercise_logs WHERE sets > 5 AND reps > 10;
DELETE FROM exercise_logs WHERE exercise_name = 'Deadlift' AND weight >= 100;
DELETE FROM exercise_types WHERE type_name = 'Cardio' AND muscle_group = 'Legs';
DELETE FROM exercise_history WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND date = '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM exercise_records WHERE exercise_name = 'Deadlift' AND sets > 3;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND weight < 150;
DELETE FROM sets WHERE workout_id IN (SELECT workout_id FROM workouts WHERE workout_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM exercises WHERE exercise_category = 'Cardio' OR exercise_category = 'Yoga';
